text: My experience at the "Lotus house" was fantastic! Everything about it was just magnificent. You think the picture looks great just wait till you get there. Also Alyson was an amazing host, she showed us great places we can visit and also she even took me to her own yoga class it was very fun! I will never forget my experience there, and there for I would recommend this for anyone so pack your bags and get ready to make some great memories and not to mention the experience of a life time.
title: Lotus House Queen Bed/Bath Beauty
